text: 21.32 Luk 3.12, 7.29-30 Jon Bɨ Ñɨg Pakñeb ak apɨl, nɨbop suŋtep yenɨgabɨm takaw ak agñolɨgup ak pen, kɨdek ma gɨpek agak. Bɨ takis dep okok sek, kanɨbtam bin okok sek kɨli pen takaw anɨb ak nɨŋɨd kɨdek gɨlak agak. Kɨli gɨlak anɨb ak nepek ak pen, nɨbi gos kɨdeyɨl olap nɨŋɨd, Jon takaw ne ak ma dɨpek agak.
